Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot:



Nemesis Enforcer transformed to biped mode, hovering in the air, rasing his 
plasma rifle.  He fired off three plasma bolts at Astral.

---

Scattershot raised his automatic rifle, firing off twenty-four shells at 
Fenox's chest.
